item.description: This workshop is a basic informational class to introduce the use of crystals and stones as a tool into your everyday life. Crystals and stones can help with physical & emotional ailments as well as spiritual & lifestyle enhancements. This introduction will cover the fundamentals and make up of crystals and stones, what they are, how they work, the energy they carry and the different ways they can be used. Certain techniques can be learned such as crystals and stones for balancing the home and office, meditation, working with your chakras, working with your aura and crystal grids and alters. You will be informed on crystal and stone care, how to pick them as your tool, how to program them and how to keep them cleansed.Â  Crystals and stones will be available at this workshop for you to work with and maybe find the right one for your tool box.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: FREE Intro to Healing Crystals & Stones
